about:
After working for several years in the retail sector, mainly in the cultural sector and bars specializing in craft beers. By experimenting with several positions including team leader and associate boss.

I began my apprenticeship in the field of front-end development within Open Class Rooms in my free time and I understood very quickly that this area, which was a curiosity, was becoming a growing concern.

I undertook a retraining in order to validate and deepen my skills with a first diploma in front-end development.

Curious and passionate, my goal is to improve and learn more in a field that is constantly evolving every day.
subtitle: Subtitle
pSkills: My anchor point being the visual part and the user experience, I nevertheless seek to understand and learn data management and everything that constitutes back-end development.
name: Name
